SEARCH
Package database

Class CampDatabase

java.lang.Object
database.CampDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database<Camp>
public class CampDatabase extends Object implements Database<Camp>
The database containing all the camp data from .csv.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CampDatabase getInstance()
      Provides access to the single instance of the CampDatabase class, creating it if it does not exist.
      Returns:
      The single instance of CampDatabase.

    • load

      public ArrayList<Camp> load()
      Loads camp data from a CSV file into the application. Parses each line of the file into a Camp object and adds it to the list of camps.
      Specified by:
      load in interface Database<Camp>
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Camp objects representing all camps loaded from the CSV file.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the CSV file with current camp data. Serializes each camp object into a comma-separated string and writes it to the file.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Database<Camp>

    • getCamps

      public ArrayList<Camp> getCamps()
      Retrieves the list of all camps.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Camp objects.

    • getCampByID

      public Camp getCampByID(int campID)
      Searches for a camp by its ID and returns the corresponding Camp object.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Camp object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • addCamp

      public boolean addCamp(Camp camp)
      Adds a new Camp object to the list and updates the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the camp was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • deleteCamp

      public boolean deleteCamp(int campID)
      Deletes a camp from the list based on its ID and updates the CSV file. Ensures that the camp does not have any attendees or committee members before deletion.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the camp was deleted successfully, false otherwise.
